price: そのような者たちの（来世での）住処は、彼らが（現世で）稼いでいたもの（罪）ゆえの業火。
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: ulāika mawāhumu al-nāru bimā kānū yaksibūna
